tool_description: The Uncovered Treasure API provides access to over 25,000 revealed truths from every book and chapter in the Bible, compiled by Phil Largent over the last 25 years.

api_list.name: /topics
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all topics available in the Uncovered Treasure API.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Optional JSONP callback for cross-domain requests.

api_list.name: /random
api_list.description: Get a random treasure from the Bible.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Optional JSONP callback for cross-domain requests.

api_list.name: /verse/{verse}
api_list.description: Retrieve treasure based on a specific Bible verse.

required_parameters.name: verse
required_parameters.description: The Bible verse in common English format, e.g., '1 Corinthians 1:5'.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Optional JSONP callback for cross-domain requests.

api_list.name: /search/{searchterm}
api_list.description: Search for treasures by a specific term, such as 'wisdom'.

required_parameters.name: searchterm
required_parameters.description: The term to search for in the treasures, e.g., 'God's plan'.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Optional JSONP callback for cross-domain requests.

api_list.name: /today
api_list.description: Get the treasure of the day from the Bible.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Optional JSONP callback for cross-domain requests.

api_list.name: /topic/{topic}
api_list.description: Retrieve entries related to a specific topic from the Bible.

required_parameters.name: topic
required_parameters.description: The topic to search for, e.g., 'seek God'.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Optional JSONP callback for cross-domain requests.
